sense.gloss: miniature shrine with double doors (used to store important Buddhist items such as sutras, etc.)
cabinet with double doors (used by the nobility to store books, etc.)
carved and decorated stone container for storing the bones of one's ancestors (in Okinawa)
behaving in a way characteristic of teenagers going through puberty, esp. by being overly self-conscious, 2nd year of junior high sickness
cabinet with double doors (used by the nobility to store books, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑男子↑↓だんし↓↑厨房↑↓ちゅうぼう↓に↑入↑↓はい↓るべからず。
sdata.e: Men should keep out of the kitchen.

sdata.j: ↑厨房↑↓ちゅうぼう↓はどこにありますか？
↑厨房↑↓ちゅうぼう↓はどこにありますか？
↑厨房↑↓ちゅうぼう↓に↑猫↑↓ねこ↓がいるわよ。
sdata.e: There is a cat in the kitchen.

sdata.j: ↑厨房↑↓ちゅうぼう↓にはパンを↑焼↑↓や↓くオーブンがあります。
sdata.e: There is an oven to bake bread in the kitchen.

sdata.j: ↑厨房↑↓ちゅうぼう↓って、↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑足↑↓た↓りてる？
sdata.e: Are there sufficient people in the kitchen?

sdata.j: ↑厨房↑↓ちゅうぼう↓って、↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑足↑↓た↓りてる？
sdata.e: Are there enough people in the kitchen?

sdata.j: ↑厨房↑↓ちゅうぼう↓って、↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑足↑↓た↓りてる？
sdata.e: Is there enough manpower in the kitchen?

sdata.j: ↑厨房↑↓ちゅうぼう↓って、↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑足↑↓た↓りてる？
sdata.e: Is there sufficient manpower in the kitchen?

sdata.j: ↑厨房↑↓ちゅうぼう↓の↑掃除↑↓そうじ↓がまだだわ。
sdata.e: I haven't cleaned the kitchen yet.
